resources.string: The illustrations help clarify the terms NUT and Bridge on different string instruments, essential for understanding their construction and design.

The calculation of trets involves precise measurements to ensure each note is in tune across the string. Our app uses a sophisticated algorithm to calculate these positions, allowing custom designs while maintaining musical accuary.

This app has been developep for luthiers, musicians and hobbyists looking for precision when calculating fret measurements for stringed instruments such as guitars, requintos, and string bass. Our goal is to facilitate the design and construction of custom instruments with a practical and reliable tool.
Inspired by our passion for music and lutherie, we have created an app that combines tradition and technology to support creators around the world.
Develop by Aaron Hdez Dguez. Thanks to all the luthiers and musicians who inspired this project.
